thread.title: Skip the Traffic: Free Eco-Friendly Shuttle Available for Plymouth Holiday Stroll - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Skip the Traffic: Free Eco-Friendly Shuttle Available for Plymouth Holiday Stroll - NewsBreak

author: NewsBreak
title: Skip the Traffic: Free Eco-Friendly Shuttle Available for Plymouth Holiday Stroll - NewsBreak
text:
7 hours ago Photo by Plymouth Downtown Waterfront District The Plymouth Downtown Waterfront District is encouraging residents and visitors to take advantage of a free transportation option during this weekend's Holiday Stroll event. As crowds gather for the festive celebration, organizers are promoting Circuit, a complimentary shuttle service, as a convenient alternative to navigating holiday traffic.
"Want to skip the traffic getting around Plymouth during the Holiday Stroll weekend? Don't forget about Circuit!" the Plymouth Downtown Waterfront District announced. The organization emphasized that attendees can "use the app to hail a ride on the Circuit shuttle, a free, accessible, and eco-friendly option for getting around town."
The Circuit shuttle service offers several advantages for Holiday Stroll attendees. The service is completely free of charge, making it an economical choice for families and individuals attending the event. Additionally, the shuttles are designed to be accessible to all community members, ensuring that everyone can participate in the holiday festivities regardless of mobility needs.
To use the service, the Plymouth Downtown Waterfront District advises attendees to "check the map to see the pickup locations" available through the Circuit app. This user-friendly technology allows riders to plan their routes and request rides conveniently from their smartphones, making it easier to navigate between different Holiday Stroll activities and venues throughout Plymouth.
Photo by Plymouth Downtown Waterfront District Photo by Plymouth Downtown Waterfront District
